languages.text: Блюстители отводят глаза: кажется, все догадываются, что шло в пищу отчаявшимся людям, но никто не готов обсуждать это вслух. Шепотки о чудовищной ереси разносятся по палубам.

The enforcers look away. It seems everyone can guess what sustenance those desperate people have been living on, but none are ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy begin spreading through the decks.
languages.original_text: Блюстители отводят глаза: кажется, все догадываются, что шло в пищу отчаявшимся людям, но никто не готов обсуждать это вслух. Шепотки о чудовищной ереси разносятся по палубам.

traits.locale_text: The enforcers look away. It seems everyone has guessed what food those desperate people survived on, but no one is ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy spread across the decks.
The enforcers look away. It seems everyone has guessed what food those desperate people survived on, but no one is ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy spread across the decks.

The enforcers look away. It seems everyone can guess what sustenance those desperate people have been living on, but none are ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy begin spreading through the decks.

The enforcers look away. It seems everyone can guess what sustenance those desperate people have been living on, but none are ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy begin spreading through the decks.

languages.text: Die Enforcer wenden sich ab. Offenbar kann jeder erraten, wovon diese verzweifelten Leute sich ernährt haben, aber niemand ist bereit, darüber zu reden. Geflüster von einer grauenhaften Ketzerei breitet sich auf den Decks aus.
languages.original_text: The enforcers look away. It seems everyone can guess what sustenance those desperate people have been living on, but none are ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy begin spreading through the decks.

traits.locale_text: Die Enforcer wenden sich ab. Offenbar kann jeder erraten, wovon diese verzweifelten Leute sich ernährt haben, aber niemand ist bereit, darüber zu reden. Geflüster von einer grauenhaften Ketzerei breitet sich auf den Decks aus.

languages.text: Les prévôts détournent le regard. Tous semblent deviner ce que ces gens désespérés ont dû manger pour survivre, mais aucun n'est prêt à le révéler. Des rumeurs évoquant une monstrueuse hérésie commencent à se propager sur tous les ponts.
languages.original_text: The enforcers look away. It seems everyone can guess what sustenance those desperate people have been living on, but none are ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy begin spreading through the decks.

traits.locale_text: Les prévôts détournent le regard. Tous semblent deviner ce que ces gens désespérés ont dû manger pour survivre, mais aucun n'est prêt à le révéler. Des rumeurs évoquant une monstrueuse hérésie commencent à se propager sur tous les ponts.

languages.text: 執行官たちは目をそらした。絶望的な状況にあった人々が何を糧に生き延びていたのか、誰もが察しているようだが、それについて口にする者はいない。恐るべき異端の噂が船内の各デッキに広まり始めた。
languages.original_text: The enforcers look away. It seems everyone can guess what sustenance those desperate people have been living on, but none are ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy begin spreading through the decks.

traits.locale_text: 執行官たちは目をそらした。絶望的な状況にあった人々が何を糧に生き延びていたのか、誰もが察しているようだが、それについて口にする者はいない。恐るべき異端の噂が船内の各デッキに広まり始めた。

languages.text: El personal de seguridad aparta la mirada. Parece que todo el mundo puede adivinar qué ha estado comiendo esta gente desesperada, pero nadie quiere hablar del tema. Por las cubiertas corren rumores de una herejía espantosa.
languages.original_text: The enforcers look away. It seems everyone can guess what sustenance those desperate people have been living on, but none are ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy begin spreading through the decks.

traits.locale_text: El personal de seguridad aparta la mirada. Parece que todo el mundo puede adivinar qué ha estado comiendo esta gente desesperada, pero nadie quiere hablar del tema. Por las cubiertas corren rumores de una herejía espantosa.

languages.text: 执法者移开了目光。看起来，每个人都猜到了那些陷入绝境的人是如何存活下来的，但没人打算说出这个答案。异端邪说的窃窃私语开始在甲板上传播起来。
languages.original_text: The enforcers look away. It seems everyone can guess what sustenance those desperate people have been living on, but none are ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy begin spreading through the decks.

traits.locale_text: 执法者移开了目光。看起来，每个人都猜到了那些陷入绝境的人是如何存活下来的，但没人打算说出这个答案。异端邪说的窃窃私语开始在甲板上传播起来。

languages.text: İnfazcılar bakışlarını kaçırıyor. Aslında o çaresiz insanların yemek olmadan nasıl idare edebildiklerini tahmin etmek zor değil. Ancak hiçbiri bunu dillendirmeye yanaşmıyor. Korkunç bir kâfirliğe dair söylentiler, güvertede yayılıyor.
languages.original_text: The enforcers look away. It seems everyone can guess what sustenance those desperate people have been living on, but none are ready to talk about it. Whispers of a monstrous heresy begin spreading through the decks.

traits.locale_text: İnfazcılar bakışlarını kaçırıyor. Aslında o çaresiz insanların yemek olmadan nasıl idare edebildiklerini tahmin etmek zor değil, ancak hiçbiri bunu dillendirmeye yanaşmıyor. Korkunç bir kâfirliğe dair söylentiler, güvertede yayılıyor.
